column5: Welcome to Houston!   Located in a beautiful, eclectic post-war neighborhood in the heart of Houston, our guest cottage in Lindale Park is the perfect location whether you're here for business, visiting family, a concert at the WOMH, a game at NRG or the Toyota Center.  Awesome local restaurants and close proximity to everything make our neighborhood a perfect location for your Houston visit. See you soon!
column8: Serene, Modern Guest Cottage in Heart of the City
